original_text:
Gold Canyon
Osa avventurarti nella Slot del Gold Canyon, un posto meraviglioso che nasconde una quantità incalcolabile di pepite d’oro. Gioca su cinque rulli e 20 linee di pagamento sempre attive, e con scommesse che partono da un minimo di 0,10 euro per giro, e raggiungono un massimo di 20,00 euro. Il gioco porta un bonus gratuito per i giri, insieme alla funzione di esplosione della dinamite, che offre la possibilità di vincere un premio di 1000x. Il simbolo più remunerativo del gioco paga 10.000x per cinque di questi simboli uguali su una linea, sulla puntata massima.
Non è facile farsi strada attraverso le migliaia di eccellenti slot online tra cui scegliere, ma tutti i cercatori in erba ameranno la possibilità di giocare alla slot machine Gold Canyon di Betsoft.
Un po’ del divertimento è fornito da cowboy che rappresentano gli Expanding Wilds che possono sostituire altri simboli all’interno di una payline. Ci sono anche pepite d’oro ad alto rendimento, mentre i grappoli di dinamite sparpagliati premiano grandi vittorie e giri gratis. Continuate a leggere la nostra recensione delle slot Gold Canyon per ulteriori informazioni importanti!
Una grafica da selvaggio West
La slot Gold Canyon sembra avere tutto ciò che serve quando si tratta di potenziali vincite e l’emozione di un serio gioco di slot. Questa slot machine ha un ritorno teorico al giocatore superiore alla media, con 20 linee di pagamento sempre attive e una vincita massima possibile di 4,774x moltiplicata per la scommessa.
L’avventura inizia a cavallo, ai margini di una vasta frontiera. L’obiettivo è quello di ottenere il maggior numero possibile di combinazioni vincenti nella durata del gioco, e questo può andare avanti a seconda del tuo bankroll, ossia il tuo budget iniziale con il quale cominci a scommettere. Premendo il pulsante Play, le bobine entrano in rotazione e recuperano una serie di simboli.
Le carte da Poker che partono dal 10 e finiscono con l’Asso, disegnate come fossero rivestite di ferro, sono i simboli di valore inferiore, importanti per sostenere l’equilibrio, mentre le immagini sono quei simboli che ti possono portare a fare qualche bella vittoria.
La slot machine Gold Canyon è disponibile su cellulare, tablet e desktop, quindi è facile andare nel selvaggio West ovunque ci si trovi. Stranamente per il fornitore di software Betsoft, la grafica è solo in 2D, ma fornisce un’impostazione eccellente. Anche la grafica va di pari passo con l’audio per dare al gioco un’atmosfera rilassante.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Uno sguardo al simbolo delle vincite è dato all’interno della tabella dei pagamenti, che è una fonte di informazioni sulle caratteristiche dei bonus, sulle regole generali del gioco e su poche altre cose. Anche se non è necessario sfogliare ciò che c’è nella tabella dei pagamenti, può essere utile dare un’occhiata solo per sapere quale importo ogni simbolo può pagare per ciascuna delle istanze vincenti. Per accedere alla tabella dei pagamenti selezionate il pulsante del menu in basso a sinistra della pagina.
Il simbolo più prezioso nella slot Gold Canyon è la pepita d’oro. Quando cinque di questi simboli atterrano su una delle 20 linee di pagamento, il premio per una scommessa di 20,00 euro sarà di 10.000x. Facendo due calcoli, capirai che con 20 euro scommessi potrai vincerne 200.000! Questo simbolo è seguito dallo stallone che paga 2.000x sulla linea di scommessa. Questi due simboli sono gli unici nel gioco che possono pagare con solo due in vista, su una linea di pagamento.
Per di più, entrambi questi simboli che pagano molto possono essere sostituiti dal Wild per effettuare una combinazione ancora più pagante. Il resto dei simboli del quadro può pagare 500x, 400x, 200x e così via, per cinque simboli su una linea di pagamento.
Il simbolo Scatter è l’iniziatore della funzione gratuita di bonus di giri ed è anche un simbolo autonomo. Ogni volta che atterra sui rulli in tre o più casi, non solo farà scattare i giri liberi, ma causerà anche un’esplosione, lasciando uno spazio vuoto che viene riempito da una nuova serie di simboli.
Allo stesso modo, le esplosioni successive potrebbero portare a riempire l’intero set di bobine con i simboli della dinamite, nel qual caso c’è un premio in denaro di 1000 euro.
Il bonus gratuito per le rotazioni è familiare sia ai professionisti delle slot che ai novizi. Nei giri gratuiti del Gold Canyon, ogni ulteriore atterraggio di dinamite sui rulli inviterà a fare un altro giro gratuito. Quindi, più otterrai questo simbolo, più giri gratuiti avrai la possibilità di ottenere per fare i soldi veri grazie alla fortuna.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Se la slot online Gold Canyon ti ha fatto venire voglia di partecipare alla caccia all’oro, troverai molti altri giochi a tema wild west.
Ti consigliamo di provare qualche giro del Wild Wild West: The Great Train Heist di NetEnt. La differenza con questa slot è che dovrete rubare l’oro piuttosto che trovarlo. Tenete gli occhi aperti per i treni Scatter che scatenano giri liberi con wilds in espansione, o wilds  moltiplicatori.

raw_translation.response:
Gold Canyon:
Dare to venture into the Gold Canyon slot, a marvelous place that hides an incalculable amount of gold nuggets. Play on five reels and 20 always active paylines, with bets starting from a minimum of 0.10 euros per spin, up to a maximum of 20.00 euros. The game features a free bonus for spins, along with the dynamite explosion function, which offers the chance to win a prize of 1000x. The most rewarding symbol of the game pays 10,000x for five of these matching symbols on a line, on maximum bet.
It's not easy to make your way through the thousands of excellent online slots to choose from, but all aspiring prospectors will love the opportunity to play the Gold Canyon slot machine by Betsoft.
A bit of fun is provided by cowboy symbols that represent Expanding Wilds, which can replace other symbols within a payline. There are also high-yield gold nuggets, while scattered clusters of dynamite reward big wins and free spins. Keep reading our Gold Canyon slot review for more important information!
Wild West graphics
The Gold Canyon slot seems to have everything it takes when it comes to potential wins and the excitement of a serious slot game. This slot machine has an above-average theoretical return to player, with 20 always active paylines and a maximum possible win of 4,774x multiplied by the bet.
The adventure starts on horseback, on the edge of a vast frontier. The goal is to get as many winning combinations as possible during the game's duration, and this can go on depending on your bankroll, which is your initial budget to start betting. Pressing the Play button, the reels spin and retrieve a series of symbols.
The Poker cards ranging from 10 to Ace, drawn as if covered in iron, are the lower value symbols, important for maintaining balance, while the images are the symbols that can lead you to make some nice wins.
The Gold Canyon slot machine is available on mobile, tablet, and desktop, so it's easy to go to the Wild West wherever you are. Strangely for software provider Betsoft, the graphics are only in 2D, but they provide an excellent setting. The graphics also go hand in hand with the audio to give the game a relaxing atmosphere.
Slot Machine Functions and Symbols
A look at the winning symbol is given inside the paytable, which is a source of information on bonus features, general game rules, and a few other things. Although it is not necessary to browse what is in the paytable, it can be helpful to take a look just to know how much each symbol can pay for each winning instance. To access the paytable, select the menu button at the bottom left of the page.
The most precious symbol in the Gold Canyon slot is the gold nugget. When five of these symbols land on one of the 20 paylines, the prize for a bet of 20.00 euros will be 10,000x. By doing some calculations, you will understand that with 20 euros bet, you can win 200,000! This symbol is followed by the stallion which pays 2,000x on the bet line. Both of these highly paying symbols can be replaced by the Wild to make an even more winning combination. The rest of the frame symbols can pay 500x, 400x, 200x, and so on, for five symbols on a payline.
The Scatter symbol is the initiator of the free bonus spins feature and is also a standalone symbol. Whenever it lands on the reels in three or more cases, it will not only trigger the free spins but also cause an explosion, leaving an empty space that is filled with a new set of symbols.
Similarly, successive explosions could lead to filling the entire reel set with dynamite symbols, in which case there is a cash prize of 1000 euros.
The free bonus for spins is familiar to both slot professionals and newcomers. In the Gold Canyon free spins, every further landing of dynamite on the reels invites you to make another free spin. So, the more you get this symbol, the more free spins you will have the chance to get to make real money thanks to your luck.
Other similar slot machines
If the Gold Canyon online slot has made you want to join the gold rush, you will find many other wild west themed games.
We recommend trying a few spins of NetEnt's Wild Wild West: The Great Train Heist. The difference with this slot is that you will have to steal the gold rather than find it. Keep an eye out for the Scatter trains that trigger free spins with expanding wilds or multiplier wilds.

Wild West Graphics

The goal is to get as many winning combinations as possible during the game, and this can go on depending on your bankroll, i.e., your initial budget with which you start betting. The Gold Canyon slot machine is available on mobile, tablet, and desktop, so it’s easy to go to the wild west wherever you are. These two symbols are the only ones in the game that can pay with only two in view, on a payline.

Moreover, both these highly paying symbols can be replaced by the Wild to make an even more paying combination. The rest of the frame's symbols can pay 500x, 400x, 200x, and so on, for five symbols on a payline.

The Scatter symbol is the initiator of the free bonus spin feature, and it is also a standalone symbol. Every time it lands on the reels in three or more cases, it not only triggers the free spins but also causes an explosion, leaving an empty space that is filled with a new set of symbols.

Likewise, successive explosions could lead to filling the entire reel set with the dynamite symbols, in which case there is a cash prize of 1000 euros.

The free spin bonus is familiar to both slot professionals and novices. In Gold Canyon's free spins, each additional dynamite landing on the reels will invite another free spin. Therefore, the more you get this symbol, the more free spins you'll have the chance to earn and make real money thanks to luck.

If the Gold Canyon online slot has made you want to join the gold rush, you'll find many other wild west-themed games.

Review:
 
Gameplay mechanics and features

Gold Canyon is a 5-reel, 20-payline slot machine with a Wild West theme. The game features a free spin bonus and a dynamite explosion feature that can lead to a 1000x prize. Cowboy symbols serve as the Expanding Wilds, and gold nuggets and scattered clusters of dynamite reward players with big wins.

Betting options and limits

Players can bet on Gold Canyon with a minimum of 0.10 euros per spin and a maximum of 20.00 euros per spin.

Bonus rounds and special features

Gold Canyon offers a free spin bonus feature, which awards free spins for each additional dynamite symbol that lands on the reels. The game also features a dynamite explosion feature that can lead to a 1000x prize. Cowboy symbols serve as the Expanding Wilds, and gold nuggets and scattered clusters of dynamite reward players with big wins.

Payouts and top-paying symbols

The most lucrative symbol in Gold Canyon is the gold nugget, which pays 10,000x for five identical symbols on a payline at the maximum bet of 20.00 euros per spin. The stallion symbol pays 2,000x on the bet line. Both highly paying symbols can be replaced by the Expanding Wild to make even more paying combinations. The rest of the symbols pay up to 500x, 400x, 200x, and so on, for five symbols on a payline. The Scatter symbol triggers the free spin bonus and is also a standalone symbol. When it lands on the reels in three or more cases, it triggers the free spins and causes an explosion, leaving room for a new set of symbols to fill the empty space. Successive explosions can lead to filling the reels with dynamite symbols, which rewards players with a cash prize of 1000 euros.

Graphics and audio

Gold Canyon has a Wild West theme and features graphics that portray the adventure of hunting for gold in this frontier. The game has 2D graphics that provide an excellent setting, and the graphics go hand in hand with the audio to give the game a relaxing atmosphere.

Accessibility across devices

Gold Canyon is accessible on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices, making it easy to play and enjoy wherever you are.

Overall theme and atmosphere

Gold Canyon has a Wild West theme that reflects the excitement and adventure of finding gold in the frontier. The game features symbols that portray the adventure of gold mining along with a relaxing atmosphere created by the graphics and audio. Overall, Gold Canyon is an enjoyable slot machine with potential for big wins and great entertainment.

Review: Gold Canyon

Are you ready to venture into the world of Gold Canyon, a marvelous place hiding an incalculable amount of gold nuggets? Play on five reels and 20 always-active paylines, with bets starting from a minimum of 0.10 euros per spin and reaching a maximum of 20.00 euros. The game features a free spin bonus, along with the dynamite explosion feature, which offers the chance to win a 1000x prize. The game’s most lucrative symbol pays 10,000x for five of these identical symbols on a line, at the maximum bet.

It’s not easy to navigate the thousands of excellent online slots to choose from, but all the budding prospectors will love the chance to play the Gold Canyon slot machine by Betsoft.

A bit of fun is provided by the cowboy symbols that serve as the Expanding Wilds, which can replace other symbols within a payline. There are also highly rewarding gold nuggets, while scattered clusters of dynamite reward big wins and free spins. Keep reading our Gold Canyon slot review for more important information!

Wild West Graphics

The Gold Canyon slot seems to have everything it takes when it comes to potential winnings and the excitement of a serious slot game. This slot machine has an above-average theoretical return to player rate, with 20 always-active paylines and a possible maximum win of 4,774x multiplied by the bet.

The adventure begins on horseback, on the edge of a vast frontier. The goal is to get as many winning combinations as possible during the game, and this can go on depending on your bankroll, i.e., your initial budget with which you start betting. By pressing the Play button, the reels begin to spin and retrieve a series of symbols.

The Poker cards that start from 10 and end with the Ace, designed as if coated in iron, are the lower-value symbols, important for maintaining balance, while the images are those symbols that can lead to some nice wins.

The Gold Canyon slot machine is available on mobile, tablet, and desktop, so it’s easy to go to the wild west wherever you are. Strangely for the software provider Betsoft, the graphics are only in 2D, but provide an excellent setting. The graphics also go hand in hand with the audio to give the game a relaxing atmosphere.

Slot Machine Functions and Symbols

A look at the payout symbol is given within the paytable, which is a source of information on bonus features, general game rules, and a few other things. Although it's not necessary to browse what's in the paytable, it can be useful to take a look just to know how much each symbol can pay for each winning instance. To access the paytable, select the menu button at the bottom left of the page.

The most valuable symbol in the Gold Canyon slot is the gold nugget. When five of these land on any of the 20 paylines, the prize for a 20.00 euro bet will be 10,000x. Doing some calculations, you'll understand that with 20 euro bets, you can win 200,000! This symbol is followed by the stallion that pays 2,000x on the bet line. These two symbols are the only ones in the game that can pay with only two in view, on a payline.

Moreover, both these highly paying symbols can be replaced by the Wild to make an even more paying combination. The rest of the frame's symbols can pay 500x, 400x, 200x, and so on, for five symbols on a payline.

The Scatter symbol is the initiator of the free bonus spin feature, and it is also a standalone symbol. Every time it lands on the reels in three or more cases, it not only triggers the free spins but also causes an explosion, leaving an empty space that is filled with a new set of symbols.

Likewise, successive explosions could lead to filling the entire reel set with the dynamite symbols, in which case there is a cash prize of 1000 euros.

The free spin bonus is familiar to both slot professionals and novices. In Gold Canyon's free spins, each additional dynamite landing on the reels will invite another free spin. Therefore, the more you get this symbol, the more free spins you'll have the chance to earn and make real money thanks to luck.

Other Similar Slot Machines

If the Gold Canyon online slot has made you want to join the gold rush, you'll find many other wild west-themed games.

We recommend trying a few spins of NetEnt's Wild Wild West: The Great Train Heist. The difference with this slot is that you have to steal gold rather than find it. Keep an eye out for Scatter trains that trigger free spins with expanding wilds or multiplying wilds.
